name: Backpack
description: A leather bag with shoulder straps. Holds up to 400 coins.

name: Barrel
description: A wooden barrel that holds 40 gallons (320 pints).

name: Belt pouch
description: A leather pouch that holds up to 50 coins.

name: Casket (iron, large)
description: A solid iron casket. A large casket can hold up to 800 coins.

name: Casket (iron, small)
description: A solid Iron casket. A small casket can hold up to 250 coins.

name: Chest (wooden, large)
description: A large chest can hold 1,000 coins

name: Chest (wooden, small)
description: A small chest can hold 300 coins.

name: Sack
description: A large, hessian sack that can hold 600 coins.

name: Scroll case
description: An oiled leather tube with a cap. Not completely watertight.

name: Vial (glass)
description: A glass vial that can hold up to half a pint of liquid.

name: Waterskin
description: A leather container that holds up to 2 pints of liquid. Weighs 5 coins when empty.
